titleStmt.title: The accuser of our brethren cast down in righteous judgment against that spirit of hellish jealousie vented in a great confused book, falsly entituled, The Christian-Quaker distinguished from the apostate and innovator, in five parts ; the fallacy and force whereof being herein clearly detected & justly repelled.
titleStmt.author: Whitehead, George, 1636?-1723.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to George Whitehead. cf. NUC pre-1956.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
